mapper.select:
select
from t_brand_analysis_record r WHERE report_time BETWEEN #{reportTimeA,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{reportTimeB,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and EXISTS (SELECT 1 from t_brand_analysis a where a.id = r.analysis_id )

select
from t_brand_analysis_record WHERE analysis_id = #{analysisId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER by report_time DESC limit 1
